meanings.definition: Making or causing to appear thinner or more slender.
meanings.sent1: She wore a slimming dress that made her look more slender.
meanings.sent2: The slimming effect of the black outfit was noticeable.
meanings.sent3: The slimming mirror in the store made everyone look taller and thinner.
meanings.sent4: The slimming shadows cast by the evening sun elongated their figures.
meanings.sent5: The slimming swimsuit accentuated her curves in all the right places.

meanings.definition: The act or process of becoming thinner or more slender.
meanings.sent1: Her slimming journey involved healthy eating and regular exercise.
meanings.sent2: The slimming of her waistline was a result of her dedicated efforts.
meanings.sent3: The slimming of the crowd as they left the concert venue was comical.
meanings.sent4: The slimming of the tree branches in winter made them look delicate and elegant.
meanings.sent5: The slimming of the budget was necessary to save for the vacation.
